game.name: Pack my LunchBox
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Pack my LunchBox is a cute and relaxing puzzle game where you assemble lunchboxes based on customer wishes. Read the cards, consider their likes and dislikes, and choose the perfect meal, drink, and snack. Meet all the conditions to clear the level!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pack my LunchBox is a cute and relaxing puzzle game where you assemble lunchboxes based on customer wishes. Read the cards, consider their likes and dislikes, and choose the perfect meal, drink, and snack. Meet all the conditions to clear the level!
